  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:E112_1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>E112_1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Funding elite sport</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Finanzierenauslesesport</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sport de placement d'élite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esporte financiando do elite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sport costituente un fondo per dell'elite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αθλητισμός ελίτ χρηματοδότησης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Deporte de financiamiento de la élite</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">Training and preparing to compete as an elite athlete can take significant financial support. Where does the money to support such athletes in the UK come from? This unit will examine the question of funding in UK elite sport.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Health and Lifestyle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">sport</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Ausbildung und das Vorbereiten, als 
Ausleseathlet zu konkurrieren können bedeutenden finanziellen Support
nehmen. Woher unterstützt das Geld solche Athleten in 
Großbritannien kommt? Diese Maßeinheit überprüft die Frage 
der Finanzierung im BRITISCHEN Auslesesport.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La formation et la préparation pour concurrencer
en tant qu'athlète d'élite peuvent prendre l'aide financière 
significative. D'où est-ce que l'argent supporte de tels 
athlètes au R-U vient ? Cette unité examinera la question du 
placement dans le sport BRITANNIQUE d'élite.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Treinar e preparar-se para competir como um 
atleta do elite podem fazer exame da sustentação financeira 
significativa. De onde o dinheiro suporta tais atletas no Reino 
Unido vem? Esta unidade examinará a pergunta de financiar no 
esporte BRITÂNICO do elite.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'addestramento e prepararsi per competere come 
atleta dell'elite possono prendere il contributo finanziario 
significativo. Da dove i soldi sostengono tali atleti nel Regno 
Unito vengono? Questa unità esaminerà la domanda di costituire
un fondo per nello sport BRITANNICO dell'elite.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κατάρτιση και να προετοιμαστούν να ανταγωνιστούν ως 
αθλητή ελίτ μπορούν να πάρουν τη σημαντική οικονομική ενίσχυση.
Πού τα χρήματα υποστηρίζουν τέτοιους αθλητές στο UK να 
προέλθουν από; Αυτή η μονάδα θα εξετάσει το θέμα στον 
αθλητισμό βρετανικών ελίτ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El entrenamiento y la preparación competir como 
atleta de la élite pueden tomar la ayuda financiera significativa. 
¿De dónde el dinero apoya a tales atletas en el Reino Unido 
vino? Esta unidad examinará la cuestión del financiamiento en 
deporte BRITÁNICO de la élite.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesundheit und Lebensstil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sport</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Santé et style de vie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sport</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Saúde e lifestyle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">esporte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Salute e lifestyle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sport</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υγεία και τρόπος ζωής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αθλητισμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Salud y forma de vida</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">deporte</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
